data.text: xfinity has always had a few glitches, but lately, it seems a lot more. I will be watching a channel, and it will switch to another. Error codes, I follow all steps of reboots and change equipment but still remain. I have mobile as well, overall pretty good. Could be my phone , but at times, I lose service. Honestly, I think they should give you a package to pick what you want. They add $2.95 a month for a sport's channel, something I do not want.

I wish I could give a negative number but can only do 1 star, Xfinity has really dropped the ball on the phone app you use to be able to change passwords, names, add items to your wifi, now you can't do anything, you can't even pay the bill, most of the time the app doesn't even work, and when you call in the tech isn't trained very well, and I end up helping them, it's terrible.

Just horrible. Absolutely the worst app. It is very slow, unresponsive, changes fail to save after taking several minutes. Help is a blank page. It WILL make sure your bill gets paid though... even though there is never any compensation for the constant service outages. It's just awful. I think I'll change internet service providers because this thing is complete garbage. UPDATE: Continues to be garbage! After logging in four or five times in still going in circles trying to pay my bill! ARG!

We are consistently having problems with our cable lately -- programs freezing, getting error messages and being booted from recordings, playback issues with recordings, randomly re-setting, etc. It is SO frustrating and you can never reach someone easily! Our bill keeps going up, but the service gets worse! I'm just about done with Xfinity! If I could, I would give ZERO stars!

I don't know how long there's been an issue with the app. As of today, the feature to assign, pause and put my PC to sleep is missing. I set it to block internet after a certain time so my kids can't sneak on while I'm asleep. Well I'm using it and it stops. Takes me a minute to realize i set it that way. I go to the app to wake it up and I haven't managed to do it yet. Googled for help and says to go under the Wi-Fi tab. There's no Wi-Fi tab. Just overview, services and account. So frustrating.

Doesn't work correctly. Shows the device and who it's assigned to, but the time online always shows no time spent. Also doesn't let you assign time to just 1 device. It only let's you assign it to a user, so If you don't want the kids playing games, but you want them to be able to use there TV, you can't limit them individually. Now it doesn't show the devices paused when the time comes. Some of the kids actually pause others don't. Garbage. Getting about as poor as the Xfinity TV app....

Something has happened to this app. It's not working properly on my Samsung s24 Ultra, Android 14, One UI 6.1. After shutting down the app, it continues to run. Last time, it used 14% of my battery & that was only to authorize a login. It didn't stop running. The only thing with higher battery usage is the screen & android system itself. It's not a good user experience.

Terrible. The app is terrible and the xfinity support is terrible. I've had xfinity for years now and, for the most part they've been decent. But talking to their support. Word of advice; if you're ever trying to port forward, don't waste your time. You not only have to go through special, backdoorish type steps to even open the port forward options but they don't even work. You have to call customer service where they give you run around refusing to actually open them for you.

Trying to remove old hardware from the list of hardware is impossible. You end up sent to some "UNKNOWN_URL_SCHEME" error page. The fact that it's not usable from WITHIN THE APP is absurd, especially since Xfinity FORCED everyone to switch to this app! It wasn't even ready, it's been several months and it's clearly still not finished! One of the richest companies in the world and they can't afford to pay people to make an app that actually functions properly. Unbelievable.

Couldn't be worse! Not only is this app hard to navigate, missing features of the previous My Account app (which was 1000 times better!), now it won't even let me pay my bill! Absolutely mind blowing that this app exists at all. Just noticed that on the mobile data usage screen they removed the number of days left in current cycle. Why would they remove that? It was very helpful. Also, this app has absolutely nothing in it for xfinity voice customers to troubleshoot home phone problems.

There are always issues with this app. Many times you go to open and view profiles and it just freezes - which makes it harder to be able to have access to all devices when you need it. We use it to limit the boys screen time. Also we have schedules set and the app will show they are not paused when really they are - we have to pause and unpause to fix this. Would be nice if it was accurate.

Garage. Not really an app as much as it's just a stripped down port of Chrome and just navigating the Xfinity homepage, but horrible at it. It's glitchy, stops working all the time, missing tons of functions and just seems like one big advertisement page for their add-ons. Like the main button on the front, says "check internet usage". And of course it just opens a chat session with their stupid virtual bot assistant. Bottom line, it's a useless app and you're better off just using a PC browser

This app has gone downhill since first install. It's slow, freezes, and I keep getting notifications saying "we ran a speed test for you". I didn't ask for a speed test or a notification for it. And I can't figure out how to turn that off. I love the Xfinity services and equipment, but I'm about one notification away from getting my owm modem and router to get a more polished app.

It's a useless app that takes up room in your storage. I DL thinking it would help me connect to SECURE XFINITY WIFI HOTSPOT. It doesn't, it give me This device can't download an Xfinity WiFi hotspot profile. I can't make a secure connection but I could with my PC but not my phone. It used to prompt you to enter a UN/PW when you select XFINITY, now it doesn't do that on my phone. The tech support is not very helpful either, they're just collecting paychecks.

Very poor experience. I can't set up my new modem because the app says my bill is overdue, then, when I click on the payment portal, it says my balance has been overpaid (I pay extra, so it should be overpaid). Just horrible, I spent a lot of time on the phone with customer service/tech support, and they were no help. I'm going to switch providers

Terrible, it is very difficult to figure out why the internet isnt working. It is blocking some devices for no reason. Saying the Internet is "paused" but the app says it isn't paused. And then the app tells me I'm unaffected by an outage, but then when i try to troubleshoot it says theres and outage... That seems to disappear instantly when I click the 'ok' button. However, these 'outages' have nothing to do with whether i can actually connect or not.

So, the app works to look at a bill or get customer service help, but for much else it's glitchy and annoying . Any time I click on one of the many extra options/features, my screen just reloads to the current screen I am on and trying to navigate away from. It doesn't take me anywhere new or to any of the extended features. Very glitchy. This app needs a LOT of work.

Not user friendly at all. I got a new Xfinity WiFi router and can't find where on the app to activate it, and the Xfinity assistant is useless too, you open the app and go to the assistant for help to activate and it just gives you a message that says that you have to achieve this goal via the app, I AM ALREADY IN THE APP! It's maddening! The endless loop is ridiculous. Whomever designed it is terrible at their job.

Connected to an extremely kind agent for help with a disconnected device notification. Upon leaving the chat to begin repair steps, I found that I was unable to reconnect to the agent no matter what I tried. My issue was never resolved, and the app insists I'm still in a chat with the agent, so I no longer can connect with any other agents until I get back to my chat. I cannot get back. Extremely frustrating. Cannot port forward from PC, either. Only the mobile Xfinity app. I'm disappointed.

2024 Update. STILL HAS SAME PROBLEMS! Absolute garbage app for SEVEN YEARS!!! Original post: 2018. This app still sucks and still won't complete tasks! Absolute garbage! Currently it can't tell me what is connected to my system. The application's premiss is excellent however it rarely completes a task. Waking up a device never works the first several attempts, then tells me things are working but are still shut down. The app just doesn't work unfortunately. I wish it did...
data.replyText: We would like to look into this issue. If you are still experiencing issues with pausing and unpausing devices on your network, please reach out to us through the xFi Help & Support Forums and we can begin to troubleshoot.

data.text: Trying to port forward is a nightmare. They removed the option from the router itself, which now redirects to a website that was also removed, making this app the only option to port forward. Except the app gives an error when opening the port forward page. So you have to work around that by asking the chat assistant to direct you to the port forward page. But then as of the latest update the app DOESNT EVEN OPEN. I don't understand how a massive company like Comcast can be so incompetent.

I have never used a worse app. I was trying to set up my own router and modem. There is a spot in the account section to do this. I've done it before in the app. I try to set up the new one, it doesn't work. I close the app, get back in literally 5 seconds later, no update, no nothing, the whole section is gone from the app. Vanished without a trace

Form over function. It looks nice, but it's slow to load, not the clearest to navigate, and changing plan features is a bit of a chore. If I want to add/remove international coverage why does it take like 15 screens to navigate. And it's slooooooooooooow. Too many fancy graphics to load I guess.

This application is getting worse; I don't know why. When I used this application four years ago, there was no issue, but with every update, it got worse and worse. For example, I assigned my TV to a group with a downtime schedule. After a while, I changed my mind and removed the downtime, but still, my TV pauses as before. Even when I tried to unassign it, I still had the same problem.

Update review: When calling Xfinity the automated service prompts you to receive a text in order to speak to someone. They send the link and I receive a gateway 502 error. There i have to argue with the automated system in order to speak with a human. I have reported this to the customer service representative numerous times, but it still occurs. The app does not work! It keeps crashing. It is difficult to check anything on this app. It needs to be fixed immediately!

Very slow loading compared to old app. No easiest way to connect to your Xfinity email account. Several links either don't open or load very slowly or worse, locks up my phone as it endlessly waits to open. Very poorly designed and obviously not tested at all! I'm getting so tired of the problems with Xfinity and I'm going to switch to some other internet provider if they can't get their @#%* together

Port Forwarding on the app DOES NOT work. Everything else about the app works well. But the fact that you can't access port forwarding on a web browser anymore and forced to use that app. Then the app does not work for that feature is frustrating. When that problem gets resolved, I will change the star rating.

Application never works how it should, if a device previously was assigned a port forward, then is disconnected from the network, there is no way to delete or reassign that same port forward to another device, the button is greyed out. Solution is to reconnect or connect another device with that same static IP then remove. You only get that far if you're lucky enough to have the application load the WIFI section of the app. Allow users to manage their network from the router itself, not an app.

As a professional UX designer, it's been a while since an app frustrated me like this one. It contains a lot of garbage that I will never use, very little information that I am looking for, and no actionable items. For example, to change my plan it opens a web browser (!!!) In which I have to log in again (!!!) Just for it to tell me that services are offered at my address... Nice job Xfinity.

My experience with xfinity is quickly going down the drain. I've had service with them for many years. Most recent updated equipment they requested I have free of charge IS NOT WORKING for my 2 landline phones. They suggested a tech come out for $100.?! My previous router worked fine! It's very frustrating. Coincidentally they tried to sell me on switching to their cell phones vs. My Landline. Gee

UPDATE: Currently not even the option to port forward functions within the app, instead you have to ask an ai chatbot to do anything for you through a horrid dialogue tree with what you need to say not on its list. What an incredible advancement from an awful company. OLD: 6/6/23 Locking port forwarding behind this utterly broken, borderline unuseable app is perhaps the most in character choice for Comcast.

App wasn't working for me! I deleted it and reinstalled and it seemed to be working yesterday. Got up this morning and tried to open it and it wouldn't open. I'm so frustrated! I have been having so many problems lately. I feel like I'm being held hostage! I'm sick of wasting time talking to a robot that just keeps me going around in circles. My problems all started when there was an Xfinity outage in my area. Service was supposedly fixed, but nothing has been right since!

I am not able to even use the app, I enter my username and password and it takes me to a page that says "you are already signed in as..." with a 'Continue' button. If I click the button, the same page just reloads. Looked it up and a lot of people seem to have this exact problem. Can't set up new router without using the app. Pretty ridiculous.

I have been using this app for 2 years. I have not once been able to pay through the app, or troubleshoot my service. It is easier to do my own research and fix my own equipment than get help from xfinity. Your service works at a consistent 10% of what I pay for, and your customer service is as useful wet toilet paper. Adding this on, after disabling autopay several months in a row, (3) xfinity has deigned my changes nonexistent and pulled out the bill automatically anyway. UPDATE: still happens

App asks you to verify your log-in from the app, while you're using the app. Trying to manage your service plan (an upgrade in my case) and after waiting literally 5 minutes for authentication to finish, the app can't help me at all. This app is useful for only 2 things: resetting your modem remotely, and checking how much of your monthly data limit you've used (because yes... Xfinity home internet works like a 2012 cell phone line.)

Comcast asked me to review this app so here it is. It feels intentionally slow and useless, if you're trying to cancel your service dont even bother. As far as a control hub it probably works well for things you need to do during an initial setup but it feels like an advert mule for all of the other things they want to sell you. Its all rented and prices increase quickly over time, and then when you need to change your service in any meaningful way the App doesnt have the selection 'Cancel TV'..

The app sucks but the website forces you to use it. The chat assistant is not helpful, do yourself a favor and immediately ask for an agent if you are having an issue or you will get stuck in a loop with the bot. There is no way to reconfigure my router settings by myself anymore since the admin tool no longer works, so you need to get an agent to do it for you. Bring back the full functionality of the website or at least bring back the old app.

Horrible! Anytime I want to go on here and pay my bill it takes me going through 15 different screens to get to the bill page that I can pay the bill and then I just went on there to control the devices on the assigned devices and it's not even there! In one section it says assigned devices but when you click on it you get nothing! Fix your damn app! With the amount of money I spend monthly I get absolutely nothing but aggravation and slow internet! I should be notified if I need to upgrade equi

It keeps signing out and affects all my two phones and tablets. It doesn't work well with browsers. l called for over an hour but xfinity couldn't fix it. l finally did on own asking Google! The fault is at the Xfinity app not my equipment. They asked to bring it in and tried to sell another phone or tablet. I did but the same problems happen. It really is Xfinity's system. My friend says it happens to her too. Service is not their pitch.

PITA! This app makes everything take twice as long as it should and it's missing a lot! Like the ability to read email and check landline voicemail. Xfinity Voice isn't even on the services tab. I can't see the devices on my account. Everything is difficult to find. It isn't intuitive at all. The app is a mess.

The constant pausing of my devices via MoCa connections which rendered them offline, was fixed with a coax filter. Strangers are able to pause devices through the coaxial lines even though I have my own gateway and had turned MoCa off. And to top it off, hotspots auto-connect no longer works through this app because the user cannot download the profiles. The Xfinity app force closes when someone presses the hotspots button to turn it on, so the profiles are never downloaded. Broken app.

This app is a NIGHTMARE. It crashes, fails to load, loads incorrect information, and has web links that fail. It unnecessarily asks for passwords repeatedly, says the password is wrong, and then fails to load the page for changing it. I've NEVER encountered so much hassle in just trying to pay a bill. This is price gouging internet giant that can afford better web support. This is pathetic.

This app is dysfunctional. The Wi-Fi "Pause Device" option doesn't work at all. The app also just suddenly stops working so whatever I'm doing is lost & must start over two or three times before my input is successful. The modem also just added two of my neighbor's new devices onto my network without my knowledge or my password. WHAT THE HECK!!?!! Zero Security. Xfinity was no help & INSISTED that I must have forgotten that I gave my password to some stranger in my neighborhood. ABSURD!

If your Xfinity modem is "not connected" to the internet, the app will refuse to show device settings so that you can troubleshoot/fix them. Their virtual assistant is completely useless. Then you have to wait for a chat agent to pretend to look into the issue, pretend to try fixes, and finally have to send the issue over to someone else.

One of the worst apps I've ever used If I could give 0 stars I would. Help button leads to error 404 not found You don't get the option to call anyone, only message "Virtual Assistants" Forget about finding help on setting up your modem and router. Won't reflect bills that have been paid (will constantly tell you to make a payment to resume service.

this app constantly logs me out and takes forever to find my way to pay my bill. to log in, I have to jump through hoops... that I'm sure the people who set up fake accounts in my name didn't have to jump through to set it up. I will be looking for better service and pricing. xfinity charges a lot because there was no competition. now everyone is using streaming services they need to bring the price down or it's easier, and cheaper, to just watch MY channels on their streaming services.

The app is great, and I've had no issues whatsoever, except for one major issue, and that's the text chat support system. Long story short, you are out of luck if you get disconnected from your support agent, doesn't matter how many hours you've been talking to them. Sorry, did you click a link your agent sent you? Sorry your chat is now disconnected and there is no way to get back connected with that agent through the mobile app. Well, how about reconnecting through the web to that agent? NOPE

The complete opposite of improvement. It has devolved into a slow overly simplistic unmanageable mess with an overwhelming amount of bugs that the devs seemingly don't even notice. Everytime I try to redirect myself to some kind of browser link it just times out, on top of not being accessible on the desktop gateway site and forcing me to use this garbage app. Of course the response will probably be a copy and paste so why do I even bother making feedback.

Use the xfinity support forum. They will sort you out. Had tried to add unlimited data for the last couple years, no luck. Xfinity app, or chat. The support forum got me fixed up. If you ever wish to revisit the sensation of the 2G era, this app is at your service for a nostalgic trip. I'm surprised they haven't worked in an additional fee for the displeasure of using it.

I have installed and deleted the app multiple times and it won't sign on. When I start the app it says I am already signed on, but when I click Continue it just sits there with the "active circle". I took it to the Xfinity store and three different people couldn't figure it out. It is ironic that a technology company can't get its apps to work.

This garbage is not an Android app at all. It is a poorly designed web app that Comcast should be ashamed of. Its predecessor was also a web app but at least some workflows worked then. Now the front and the back end is completely broken. I cannot get absolutely anything done beyond resetting my modem. That too, IF I am lucky. Congratulations Comcast you're back to being the same awful company you used to be. I will switch to AT&T fiber soon, now that it's available in my area.

xFi pods are displayed as connected and online on the app, but it's not showing any devices connected to it. I've uninstalled/reinstalled the pods, the app, and even restarted the gateway numerous times. It still shows nothing connected to the pods. I know they're working, but no devices are popping up.

This application is technically useless and a waste of space, the features available in the app are broken. Using the browser to manage my account is much better and somewhat quicker, not by much though. It is advisable to stop trying to fix what is not broken because the current trend is making it worse. The update says its improving... It is in fact making the experience worse.

Intermittent service. we have talked to people from xfinity multiple times, And it's been going on for the last 6 months. Xfinity says it's not something that they're doing. But find out later that they're working out on the Lines Outside of our property. Put again 6 months in it's still hasn't been repaired. Intermittent service are alarm keeps going off in our home.

IF YOU'RE THINKING OF SIGNING UP FOR XFINITY, DON'T DO IT. They have THE WORST customer service I have ever experienced. I have been a Xfinity customer for 3 years. My phone keeps randomly losing service. Sometimes I can't make calls, send texts or access the internet- mind you, I pay for unlimited data. I have been experiencing this issue for about a month now. I have spoken to about ten+ different customer service representatives and have even gone to the Xfinity store twice to get this issue

It's been 10yrs and the website/app has never worked for me. Ive had 10 CX ppl "help" and even let them try to reset the pw for me and log in on their devices and I've seen many customer service people give up and tell me someone else will eventually call me but that never happens. I can't access my bills. Every 3 months or so my bill changes with no explanation. I've also been kicked off auto pay/paperless billing several times with no explanation and have to call someone adding to my bill!

Absolute worst assistant thing ever. It repeats the same solutions over and over without moving past resetting the modem. Very difficult to get a real person then when you do the assistant randomly kicks you back to talking to it and there's no way to get back to your live chat. This will 100% end up with us canceling out comcast account completely

They keep Updating it and constantly it seems, and changing it is ridiculous when it was great before. Was alot more user friendly before this last one. Now you have to search through everything just to see and pay your bill. Typical Comcast/Xfinity. And dont dare try to change anything...your bill will somehow be double or even triple what it was before, and dont bother asking about that either. Likely they won't know, and wont fix it, and will give a reason BS why, and if ya dont pay it..well.

Jesus rollerblading christ, who is responsible for this disaster of an app? Had to swap out Xfinity internet routers and it SHOULD be as easy as plugging in and according to them "activate through the app with this link". It does absolutely nothing but take forever load, make me log in repeatedly, and nowhere at all does it have any information on getting this router set up. Meanwhile, I keep getting texts telling me to "set up now!" and return my old one.

App is worthless. I will have connection issues for 30 minutes at a time, talk with my neighbors and see all of us are disconnecred but the app acts like everything is hunky-dory. Also half of its "features" are not accessible from the app, it directs you to your browser to use them there. It serves no purpose.

No other way of saying this but this app completely sucks. I'm trying to start up my new equipment and the only way to activate it is through the app but when I try to go through the app it doesn't want to load when I click manage Wi-Fi I've had it on that page for 20 minutes and nothing has changed I've closed the app and restarted my phone I've tried everything and customer service definitely won't answer me

This has to be one of the worst apps out there. Incredibly slow to do anything at all. Not an issue at all with my internet. Everything else loads just fine. The xfinity site in general is trash as well. If I had other options other than DSL where I live, I'd be jumping ship to an ISP that actually would offer something decent.

This is app is not helpful. Waste your time. Does not follow through with directions you are attempting to follow; eg. Setting up Advanced security. App continues to say setting up Advanced security but just keep on circling white circle and noisy repetitive sound. Unable to facilitate completed setup. I've been having this same trouble with this app for months. The updates have not resolved the problem. I have installed and Uninstaller this apps for months until I just give up on it. Uninstall

this app has problems. I really wish they didn't disable our ability to edit the router directly. They force us to use this app, and when it has problems we are stuck contacting support for something we should never be contacting them for. All I want to do is forward some ports, and the app don't allow that..

Loads for ages and it has bad data. I often get notifications that *my phone model* has connected to my gateway when I'm nowhere near home. I click the notification to look at the information and it loads for so long my phone times out, sometimes even crashing. I frequently try to assess connectivity through the app to no avail - when my computer & phone have 100% lost Internet connection, the app (using my datA) says my gateway is at 120% of my service. Lies. Terrible app.

Unable connect/app fail connect Been attempting to enter app for last 3 hours. wont consistently connect. stays buffering for 2-4 minutes and might not even work, get tired of waiting. unwilling to uninstall cause might lose info for account. when did get in temporarily, seems unknown devices added to account. which is likely using my data pay for. unable to pause or remove all devices because app takes forever to buffer or freezes. looking forward to when Fiber comes to area so can go back

After 3 months advanced security turns off 3 or 4 times a day...bill is now 298...searching to cut this cost... As much as I pay for xfinity (280 per) and have for 20 years...app sucks. 23 ultra and after last update the app tells me to turn on advanced security...it was on before update...it tells me to turn it on and says takes 10 minutes and the page disappears. That's it...no more advanced security??? Good thing Verizon takes care of it and trust me I will never ever have xfinity mobile.....

I have been asking for help for over 6 months regarding the issues with one of my cable boxes and tv. I cant afford $100 for a tech to come out. The problem has gone up to higher levels but I have heard nothing from anybody. I have also asked for credit after not having any cable for over a month. But nobody has done anything. And you are too expensive. 3 stars is all I can give.

Not the best. Authorized user on the account. I can use my card and make payments but I can't view the "Rewards" that are free. Also I can't it directly view past bills. I can only send them as a PDF in a message. I was using a "Flex" device, I haven't used it and a little while so they started charging me for the free device. After contacting customer support about that issue they wanted talk more about me purchasing mobile service then resolving the issue with billing...

worst company ever 0 stars if I could. over a year later I still don't have cell phone service at my own house. over a hundred hours on customer support between January and may last year I stopped calling them they don't ever fix anything. this app is ridiculously slow and doesn't work all the time. they can't do anything right. everybody that has Comcast in my area has nothing but issues with it but unfortunately we don't have a choice. everybody has two and they're both horrible

Horrible. Be ready for extreme slow loading, being redirected, logging in a couple times trying to find what your looking for only to be advised that "wifi credentials are currently unavailable". Chat is horrible. You have to leave the chat to try something and the instructions are not clear. AFTER chatting for 30 mins. I pay over 3K a year and ai can't access my wifi to see what's connected. Horrible.

Trying to activate my new modem is a nightmare. Keeps giving me "sorry, we're having some trouble" I unistalled the app, reinstalled it. Nothing. My phone is up to date. Chat with agent doesn't help at all. Internet speed is slow. Customer service is not even there. Why do I have to use the app for everything? Still not even a single update to fix this.

The troubleshooting options seem bogus and were not able to fix any issues we have had. The "pause" feature does not work either to block an unwanted connection and constantly unpauses itself when it is not supposed to. These features are worthless if they cannot reliably work.

Don't ever ever use Xfinity if you value you health. They'll try to sell you unnecessary packages that you declined in EVERY SINGLE CALL. They'll promise you faster & better speeds, but there will ALWAYS be a problem. Modem, package, location, ... They'll make sure to charge you in the meantime while you try to solve every issue tho, which leads to: They won't EVER EVER EVER transfer you to a representative. They'll do everything possible to chat with 25 different AI that won't solve anything

The # of commercials these clowns have (with ANNOYINGLY SPOILED CHILDREN) is INVERSELY PROPORTIONAL to service quality. I can't even just get straight to support because the apps have changed, nobody answers the phone, it's harder to get a real person using the prompts. Boxes don't turn on and off properly, sound doesn't come on with my main box without several gyrations of power cycling, Xfinity needs to go back to fewer commercials and more PEOPLE in technical support.

I load the app click on a profile and the app freezes on me. I have to lock my phone and unlock it quick and close the app real quick so im not stuck on your app loading a profile. This happens almost 8 out 10 times. [2-23-24, app periodically signs me out. I try to log in with my saved information on my phone from Xfinity after this and itll keep saying wrong for minutes.]

Update: Tried getting an agent to resolve getting XFINITY hotspot access back. Agent asked me to try a link. I tapped on it and was taken out of the app to an error message. When I tried to get back to the agent, i now get "It appears you already have a chat in progress in another window, please continue your chat in that window." THERE IS NO WAY TO DO THIS!!!! Original review: Wish I hadn't uninstalled the old Xfinity Hotspot app. It worked FINE. Give it back so I can use those hotspots.

This is the least user friendly app I have ever used. Each click has a long loading screen. It's almost impossible to change your plan. I entered my password at least 3 times without ever leaving the app. Every action takes so long to load. I'm not sure how this app ever launched. It's for an Internet company, it should be at least usable

l put in the new passwordyou provide and it is rejected. l go thru the cycle of requesting a password, getting a temporary password, using it, and gettig rejected. This happens over and over until l am want to toss my device out a window and just quit trying. What the heck is going on? Along with leaving comcast, l think l will return to verizon. way better service, wirth the extra $$'s

As a provider of the internet this app it's very, very lame. I like Xfinity, and I would love to switch everything, but the idea of dealing with the app is terrible. How slow, how glitchy and everything. Make sure at least your app is the best, fastest, not glitchy productivity. As internet providers, that's a must.

Was setting up Internet with a laptop connected to the modem and it forced me to download this app instead of just continuing in browser. App has no value to me outside of that and I do not appreciate having to download a 120MB app while on mobile data when I have a hardwired computer that obviously can transfer data through the router if it could give me the "you need to download an app" page

Terrible support, app fails to allow you to cancel any service. Times out attempting to contact an agent or tell you they are too busy. Article on netflix subscription fails with 400 error, as does schedule a callback. Went thru the painfull process last month to get unauthorized overpriced nextflix subscription removed from my account and a credit only to find it on my bill again this month.

Checking outage map makes it pop out and go to a web browser... Why have an app if it's just going to redirect me to open a website. I have the same problem with other parts of the Xfinity experience: they love to have you jump between the in app assistant and the phone and then it cycles you back to the app assistant.

Kind of a pain that somethings the Comcast/Xfinity cable modem router makes you control via their phone app and other things you have to go to & log onto the router's website control address. Much worse tho' is that a bunch of app features seem to just plain not work such as not allowing me to set my own private wireless password - I seem stuck with their default. Oh, and let me not forget to mention that the router's default/reset password IS "password" fer chrissakes!!

Trouble accessing data usage link from notification email, app doesn't have usage link in less than 5 pages from main menu, many links don't work from China when trying to diagnose security or outage issues at home (USA). Too much advertising, too much marketing garbage, not enough information about upload speeds or other factors affecting photographers. Service never performs 100% as advertised.

Xfinity check your app security for customers I believe w data breech, seems like the updates for the app aren't coming from Xfinity. when I talk to agents on the app they dont have grasp of English or troubleshooting steps. I also was sent a modem that doesn't have Xfinity anywhere on it except the bottom sticker. I get emails without the company logo and the app contact email doesn't look legit

Can I rate it 0 stars? The assistant is useless, just ran me around in circles. And don't get me started on whatever the abomination is that picks up the phone when you call them. I'm just trying to get someone here to fix the outside line that is cut but apparently that's too hard cause they've already missed 2 service calls.

Have to force stop the application constantly and reload it so it loads otherwise it just sits and shows the loading screen and does nothing. Happens on multiple devices with different connections. Annoying when your trying to check your security and cant see whats happening at your house. PLEASE FIX! Current device Samsung Galaxy S20+

I got disconnected from the app after submitting a request for a credit in chat. So when I went back to chat I had to start over again but when I finally got to the point to ask for the live agent it told me I already had a window open. Another check going as if I was actually in a web browser not this app. The genius developers didn't give us away to get to the other chat in progress but managed to tell us to do so. Absolutely pathetic

The assistant is never helpful, and any of the "troubleshooting" it does never helps. If I wanted it to reset my router, I would have done that. At least it has some information that's useful like my current plan and the like but overall I get more stressed out using this app.

I can't get my TV box to work. The internet works fine, but every time I try to watch a movie, I get an error that there is no internet even though internet is working everywhere else in the house. Once it catches on that I have internet, I get buffering and/or poor picture quality and sometimes just a blank screen. It is terrible and I do not recommend.

data.userName: Toda La Gloria Es De Dios
data.text: Claims to be easy. Makes everything impossible. The Classic way of doing things was easy. This app that doesn't function properly makes everything much more complicated. Important options such as DMZ and Port Forwarding do not work on the app. Don't recommend although they give you no choice. On top of that they purposefully slow down your old device so that you have to upgrade. My recommendation is stick with the old devices. They are much more reliable and actually work.

Of I can't do anything because of a bizarre sign in loop, it's useless. EVERYTHING about Xfinity is difficult. I WISH ANY other cable provider was available. The app has "Gold" status which is also useless because there's an activation loop. The rewards, as far as I can tell, don't exist. And don't bother calling for help. With the app or anything. It's set up to make you into giving up talking to a human and not the automated system. Plus it tells you to do everything you already tried.

If I could give the app a -3 that would more accurately describe how I feel about the app and it's services. 1. Moving from one place to another is a mess. Using their services online put my account in limbo. Had to call to get it unstuck. Wifi is fine once it's set up but changing literally anything is a disaster. 2. One of my computers got "paused" even though I didnt do anything and my app doesnt have necessary features to fix the issue so I can't connect to the internet. Switching Soon.

Unable to access the port forwarding or DMZ menu options, there is a persistent error that says "something went wrong." The workaround is to use the chatbot from the main screen and use the keyword "port forward" so you can navigate to the menu actually use this functionality. This is such a a basic function that is not properly implemented.

Update: 12/24/23 still horrible especially now everything is all in one app. I saw another review and they're right, it's embarrassing. This app never works. My internet is down and can't even get into the app to see what's wrong after resetting my router. Force stopping the app and restarting it doesn't help. Every update to this app just makes it worse. At least I was able to use the app in previous versions. I can't even get to the main menu. I'm on a pixel 6 pro with current android version.

The app constantly crashes about 30 seconds after opening. Getting help from the automated assistant or restarting your router/modem remotely is nearly impossible to do because the app doesn't stay open long enough to do anything. My phone even detects that the app is constantly crashing, and one time it even recommended I put it in deep sleep mode to preserve my phone's battery... LOL

Horrendous app that is bloated with xfinity ads and doesn't actually let you manage your account properly. Some of the settings are hidden so that it's almost impossible to find them. It's slow, unresponsive and is designed to sell you more services from xfinity rather than help you with account management and/or troubleshooting your service. This app is the sole reason I am considering switching my service to another company.

(Copied the following from another user that echoes my frustrations) Updated” app freezes and does not work like it used to. Can no longer unpause devices or wake devices up with a single click. The “wake up” button, tells you it just “ woke up” the devices, but they don’t work and still show they are in sleep mode. It used to work, but since the “update” it does not work unless you physically change the schedule. Then you have to remember to change the schedule back.

Everytime I try to sign into my Xfinity app it keeps rerouting me back to the log in page. This has been happening for a year. I can't access the control of my Internet and I can't change or view password. I also have to go online to pay my bill instead of just accessing the app. This has been happening every since Xfinity got rid of the app that kept paying the bill and Internet stuff separate. I have definitely talked to several customer service reps and they can't figure it out either.
